price: N’abantu ba Nuhu (ni uko twabagenje) mbere. Mu by’ukuri bari abantu b’ibyigomeke.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
